title: Astonishing good horro movie
review: The whole show is just astonishing amazing and good. The story is both scary and touching. All of the young actors performed well enough. Just amazing.

title: still amazing and solid closure
review: Despite the obvious too long and repeat pattern, the IT chapter 2 still brings a solid ending to all of the movie watcher and IT fan. The writer tries its best to bring a good story line and the whole show gives the audience good entertainment of all kinds of horro scenes. Good job.
